articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: At least 4 killed, some still missing, in avalanche in India’s Uttarakhand - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Rescue operation still under way after avalanche in Chamoli region, adjoining Tibet, trapped dozens of workers.
articles.content:
At least four people have died after an avalanche struck a highway construction site near Indias border with China, the Indian army said, a day after the accident left dozens of workers trapped.
